pageProduct.name: White Glo Toothpaste Charcoal Deep Stain Remover 150g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Charcoal Deep Stain Remover Toothpaste + Toothbrush is an activated charcoal whitening toothpaste.

How Activated Charcoal works.

1. Activated Charcoal + Flosser Tips of toothbrush clean deeper.

2. Stains, discolouration and bacteria are attracted to the highly absorbent charcoal particles.

3. The tooth surface is left detoxified, brighter and whiter.

Whitening Toothpaste with Activated Charcoal Particles helps to detoxify your mouth and removes deep stains and discolouration. The highly absorbent Activated Charcoal Particles penetrate and draw out stubborn stains, traps colour particles, fights bad breath and whitens teeth enamel.

New White Glo Flosser Tips Toothbrush.

For the ultimate deep clean use the White Glo Deep Stain Remover Toothpaste and White Glo Flosser Tip Toothbrush together. The special bristles on the Flosser Tip Toothbrush have been designed to function more effectively with the Active Charcoal Particles in the White Glo Toothpaste. The bristles are infused with charcoal to deliver even better cleaning and whitening results.

Formula developed by White Glo's Head of Dental Research. Dr Georgios V. Sotiropoulos.

Leading Teeth Whitening Cosmetic and Restorative Dentist - Mosman, Sydney Australia.

White Glo Dental Flosser Toothpicks.

Use to clear food particles and plaque from hard to reach spaces between teeth after every meal.

Full details at www.whiteglo.com

Extra strength whitening toothpaste.

Boxed Contents: New White Glo Flosser Tips Toothbrush. White Glo Charcoal Deep Stain Remover Toothpaste, New White Glo Flosser Tips Toothbrush

Size: 150g + 1 Pack

Directions

Use daily in place of your ordinary toothpaste. Brush thoroughly twice a day. Children of 6 years and younger: use a pea sized amount for supervised brushing to minimise swallowing. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources consult a dentist or doctor. Before use of this toothpaste please seek medical advice for pregnant women and children under the age of twelve.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool place, away from heat.
